Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS PHONE!!! Though be prepared to pay a LOT for internet
Reviews.Author: Chase "Sean Cruz"
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. It's the best phone I've ever had. The keyboard is just the right size and everything works great. I'll try and rate things individually.Messaging(9/10)- Messaging is extremely simple on this phone. There is no difficulty figuring out what is what. You will have to play around with it a bit to get accustomed to it however. You can also keep a record of your conversations from person to person, so there is no need to go back and forth to each message to see what you wrote.PS: They keys are considerably small. If you have giant fingers or even marginally large ones, texting may be a little difficult  as you may end up pressing more than one button at a time.Music(9/10): The music player is wonderful. It will display the CD cover or whatever picture you have set for each song. There is a shuffle feature, however, I took a point off because the shuffle is so random, sometimes you may come across the same songs, and never seem to get around to the others. The sound is very clear and concise. No static. The headphones they give you with it will slip out of your ears a lot. So I recommend purchasing an adapter that goes to 3.5mm headphones that way you can put in your own.Some of the features include:-You own customizable playlists-sorting by artists, genre, recently played, most played, last played-Repeat/shuffle-Shortcuts-background playing-sound effects(Wide, Dynamic, surround, pop, rock, etc.)-Music auto offNOTE: Music can be set as a ringtoneRadio(9/10) -The radio is excellent! As far as reception, its the same as any portable device, so I can't comment on that but as far as shortcuts, station setting, etc, its amazing.Memory(9/10)- The largest memory card you can purchase for the phone is 8GB, which is good enough for me. I can put lots of music and videos without worrying about space. Internal memory is 34MB, which isn't so badCamera/Video(8/10)- The camera is a 2MP camera and it's not bad. It's pretty much what you would expect from a 2MP camera phone. The features, such as zoom/effects/night mode/timer/viewfinder, etc are all very good. More than most phones I would say. The video player works great. Dont expect Iphone quality but it does what I need it to do for a quick video. And sound pick-up is great.Organizer(10/10)-The organizer is great. Here is a list of the organizer features:-Calender(lists wk number on the side as a bonus)[Also lists events you have missed]-MEMO-A very simple tool that you can simply use to write something down for later use. I use it to write down songs I want to download. Very useful-TASK- This is similar to memo except that this is better used for events and remembrances that you can set an alarm to-WORLD CLOCK-Useful for seeing time around the world(I never use it)-CALCULATOR-A very basic and simple calculator(not scientific) that useful for just taking a quick mathematical process-CONVERTER-This is a wonderful tool for doing conversions and it is very easy to use. You can convert Length, Weight, Volume, Area, and TemperatureInternet(?)- This is the biggest flaw, not because I think the internet sucks or anything. Frankly, I haven't even used the internet for the phone. I have T-mobile and previously, I paid $10 a month for internet. I assumed it would be the same. but when I got the phone, it said i couldn't use the internet. I looked through the plans and the cheapest one was $30 a month! YIKES! Maybe not for you, but for me, that is VERY expensive for a mobile internet. But that may be because it's unlocked. It may be different for you. I have no idea. So I'm disappointed about that. I was hoping for wi-fi to make up for it. But this phone has no wi-fi. But I already knew that when I bought it so it didn't bother me too much.Overall: An excellent phone that I would highly recommend. It has a unique look. I love the numbers on the side. It's not bothering in the slightest. However, if you know you have very large fingers, the keyboard may not be the best for you.Ok I tried to cover as much information as I could think of at the moment.If there is any other sections or info you want, let me know. It comes with Sudoku game as well. Which is a great way to relax. LOVE that. And comes with  a dictionaryNOTE: I did not buy from here. I bought on EBAY because it was a few dollars cheaper. But I made the ratings based on the phone itself

Reviews.Title: Batteries hard to find..
Reviews.Author: Hostilia
Reviews.Content: I received the phone two weeks ago with a dead battery (NB: I did not buy it on amazon!).  I thought it couldn't be too much of a problem to buy a new battery, but that turned out to be more complicated than I thought.. 1) Samsung does not give you ANY information on what type of battery the phone needs - just says "standard" in the instruction manual/website info.  2)  This "standard" battery is hard to find in the US - I had to order it via ebay from a dealer in Hong Kong.  My old phone is a Samsung and I was quite happy with it - but if this company can't be bothered to give me detailed information on the spare parts I need, I won't be bothered to buy from them again. Oh, just in case you were wondering.. the battery is called  AB483640BU.

Reviews.Title: Loved it, but no pictures
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I loved this phone. not too big , but has many great features. Unfortunately, the picture message feature cannot be utilized in the United States. There may be other features that won't work as well. After much troubleshooting with my plan carrier they advised me to call Samsung directly to help solve the problem. The tech at Samsung knew immediately what the problem was and explained that this was an international version of this phone.

Reviews.Title: Pictures and internet work on my B3310
Reviews.Author: euro traveler
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace an older unlocked Seimens model that I use exclusively while traveling in Europe,buying local phone SIM cards as I switch countries.  I like the Samsung so much, that I've decided to use ithere in the US as well.The B3310 I received after ordering off of this page came in 2 days with standard shipping,fulfilled by J&R; Music World.I was happy to find a Samsung USB data cable unexpectedly included, along with the phone, battery,dual-voltage travel charger, user guide, and a cd with Samsung's PC Studio software.The international charger has a plug made for US sockets, but since it's dual-voltage I can also use it in Europe by simply slipping a plug adapter over it.Since I wanted to try the phone out in the US before taking it to Europe, I went to the local T-Mobile store andbought a SIM card for $10.  After the clerk activated it, I had $3.34 in credit on my phone to work with, morethan enough for me to evaluate the phone and the T-Mobile network in my area.After reading about how some owners had problems with sending and receiving pictures via MMS, I asked theT-Mobile clerk to send me a test MMS and my phone failed to show it.  He then took the phone, calledT-Mobile help, and they walked him through setting up both the MMS and the WAP internet functions for me.Not planning on using the internet as I use prepaid only, but it worked as designed on 2G.Could I have set up the MMS and internet myself?  Maybe, but it would have taken me forever.Very thankful the clerk was so helpful when I all I did was buy a SIM card and no service.After installing a 4gb microSDHC card I attempted to transfer some mp3 music files from my laptop to the phone,and got a Windows message about a driver being needed.  Slipped in the cd from the box and got the driver offof it and tried again, successfully.  Once the USB driver is installed, you can simple drag and drop filesinto the phone's music folder from your pc.You do not need to install the Samsung PC Studio.  I did, but had trouble getting it to see the phone even afterchoosing to install the program and the USB driver.IMPORTANT: I had to turn my phone off while it was connected via USB after reinstalling programand USB driver and only then did my Vista laptop recognize it and finish installing the USB driver.This phone will see heavy texting while in Europe and the qwerty keyboard works wonderfully.

Reviews.Title: Phone doesn't work after 4 days
Reviews.Author: Thomas Percell "Tommy P"
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these phones based on the user feedback.  Hands down, nobody can argue with the phones sleek look and messaging system.  Only problem is.....after 4 days one of the phones does not work any more.  I cannot hear or answer calls that come in.  Both voice and speaker do not work.  I am trying to get in touch with the provider and hope that they will respond based on this comment.

Reviews.Title: Small and Handy
Reviews.Author: Rick L. Creamer
Reviews.Content: I have this phone and just Love it for its small size yet designed with only three rows of letter keys,for easier texting for someone with large hands.It has wonderful reception for calling too!

Reviews.Title: marginal at best
Reviews.Author: debora chan
Reviews.Content: This product has some nice features, but severely limited by a standby battery life of about 4 hours. Also it did not come with a headset as it should have, and only takes a micro USB headset plug, which is ridiculously hard to find. Samsung is very hard to contact, has very poor customer support, and refused to resolve the problem. I bought the phone for overseas travel, and due to the poor battery life and other problems, it was of very marginal use.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for my teen son
Reviews.Author: H. Wang
Reviews.Content: We have a few more month to be eligible for upgrade or change phone carrier. Then my son's phone went dead after it got wet.I decide to get this phone for my teen after i read the reviews. It turns out be good gift for my son.  The only down side of this phone is it is bit small. If you are big or have a big hand you may have trouble to text as fast as you want. We give this phone a 90 point score for it's quality at this price. Shipping was OK in the range.

Reviews.Title: Small yet okay phone
Reviews.Author: S. Koeiman
Reviews.Content: This phone was purchased as a gift.The person who got the phone liked it very much.Personally, I thought the phone would be a bit larger. I have tried it and it is uncomfortably small in my hands when using the qwerty keyboard. And I don't have large hands.Another thing I did not like was that when the phone is closed (i.e. keyboard not out) and you hold it in your hand and are using your thumb to push the menu buttons etc, your hand tends to automatically go into a tiny squeeze and the phone moves a bit awkwardly and makes me worry that it might not be a sturdy, long-lasting phone because it might possibly break.Other than the size and it's "weak body" the phone works fine in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Phoenix AZ
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone so far and the review by Chase is very informative and accurate in my opinion.  I only have 2 issues with the phone.  First, I don't care for the menu much... I had a difficult time locating many simple features.  Second, my phone did not come with a data transfer cable.  The port is also not a standard mini USB port so I had to purchase the cable separately for about $10.The music player feature is great and with the addition of an 8Gb micro SD card this device has basically taken the place of my MP3 player.  The music even sounds ok using the built in speaker.

Reviews.Title: Phone broken after a little over 2 months ( No Warranty)
Reviews.Author: jim
Reviews.Content: This phone seems to be ok to start with. The only problem is... it broken after a little over 2 months. I contacted Amazon and was told that it is out of return window ( given a month) and now I have to contact Samsung if I have further questions. Really a nightmare to me. ( please keep an close eye on the title, it says blah blah blah NO Warranty ). Watch out, shoppers.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone, great deal
Reviews.Author: D. Reynolds
Reviews.Content: I got this phone about a week ago. It came to my APO in a timely manner. I was wanting a phone that I could use with both my T-Mobile stateside and Iraqna in the middle east and this fir the bill quite well. Its compact, love the key board, user friendly. I reccommend this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Toastacklen
Reviews.Content: It is the perfect size! Fits right in my palm and the number pad doesn't get in the way. The keys can lock so I don't have to worry about any numbers being pressed. The battery lasts long! I just got the phone on Saturday and I charged it up and I haven't had to recharge it yet! and it's Monday! Probably tomorrow on Tuesday I will need to. And I only did about 45 minutes of talking on it so far... I'm not a big talker so that's why I like this phone!I ordered it last week April 24 for $90 and I'm surprised that it'$101 now! - May 2, 2011It's got alot of wonderful features - like alot of Alarm settings, radio, voice recodering, calendar, different phone profile settings that you can set to specifically do things, and a FAKE call setting! To pretend your getting a call to get you out of a tight spot.I love how it slides open and the keypad on the regular side of the one works with the screen.It's an awesome phone!I have ATT and I get awesome reception where I didn't get before! well the other phone was a piece of crap and it was a few years old...I ordered it off of Amazon and the order came in 2 days early! and I live in Hawaii!! Yay! Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: good "unlocked" phone
Reviews.Author: ramkii
Reviews.Content: received in time..only disadvantage is that the number buttons are arranged vertically (???)...difficult to type the numbers..but otherwise its good quality phone.

Reviews.Title: No MMS
Reviews.Author: S. Volz
Reviews.Content: Decent phone for talking and texting.  I've had this phone for one month and I like it.  I've had about a 3 day battery life with some talking, little texting, and no data use.  You can't send or receive multi-media text messages with this phone (I have AT&T; and was able to use MMS on a Razr that I used to have).  I have not used it for data because I don't carry a data plan on my service package.  The phone is smaller than a deck of cards when in the closed position.  As an international version, the clock is in 24 hour format, but you can change it to 12 hour format, the date is in day, month, year format - and you can't change that.  Favorites is spelled "Favourites".  I haven't found a way to change the font, which is one of those hand-printed style fonts.Update 31August 2011:  I am throwing this phone away.  Call quality is horrible, although it may be my service plan (AT&T;).  During calls, I can hear a small digital hiccup sound and the phone cuts out during that time.  I hear about every 3rd word of a conversation.  Hearing someone spell a word is impossible.  Texting is easy, but no MMS.  I tried to unlock the MMS using a procedure available on the internet, but it didn't work.

Reviews.Title: Very happy surprise
Reviews.Author: M. Nakano
Reviews.Content: I haven't had the greatest luck in purchasing phones on the internet, having had to return a couple in the past, but this experience has been very pleasant indeed.  Not only did it work perfectly from the get go, but it's actually a very good phone, easy to use and convienent.  Only problem was the adapter/charger (international model) which didn't work, but I needed to buy a car adapter anyway so the whole accessory package was no big deal to pick up as an extra.  It's a good buy.

Reviews.Title: A modest phone with a less then practical number pad
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Huntington
Reviews.Content: This is an ok phone - nothing particularly outstanding. It appealed to me because of 99 dollar price. I have one reservation and that is the numbers on the left side which look intriguing are actually silly to use. Holding it in one hand you don't feel natural pushing the numbers for a call - I don't imagine many will. Phones are evolving fast and there are good deals to be had particularly with smaller carriers - I am currently happy with a good Android from Virgin (no contract).

Reviews.Title: this phone rocks
Reviews.Author: nauset
Reviews.Content: i love this phone it is truly a great phone. i used to have a samsung impression but after a little while the impression just dies on you but this phone just tops it all. it doesnt have a touch screen but boy, is it easy to use. i have to say my favorite feature for this phone is the music player and the # buttons on it!!!!! the sound of the phone is amazing and the # buttons just make adding numbers into your text message soooooo much easier...it makes it easier because on the usuall phone you have to press the Fn or Sym button while you press the number on the board, but on this phone you just press the button anjd you are good to go. another great thing about the # buttons is that they made the buttons on an angle so that if the text board is in and you want to dial a number the buttons are still legable to read but they are legable if you are texting as well!this phone is just sooo easy to use and i recomend it soooooooo much that is why i gave it a 10/10.

Reviews.Title: Basically a good phone
Reviews.Author: hisbiscuit
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for a little over a month.  I do like the qwerty keyboard and a few other thing but that's about all I do - texting and calling, so there are a number of things I haven't yet figured out, like how to change ring tones.  I'm not terribly tech savvy so I'm sure it's my ignorance.  I'll have a 12-year old help me!  LOL! But my immediate concern is that the phone lights up several times a day, at least, even when nothing is happening with it...no incoming call, alarm, etc.  It's just sitting there and will light up.  This doesn't help the already problem with the battery going dead so quickly.  Also in the last couple of days this Fring thing has been on my screen and I have to hit OK and clear.  It was not coming up until just now so not sure what activated it.  What's the deal with that?  How did it get there and how do I delete it???  Not sure if the light coming on is a defect or???  Anyone have a clue to either issue?  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Felicia's ratings
Reviews.Author: Felicia N. Franklyn
Reviews.Content: This is a excellent cell phone. It has a dictionary both English and Spanish which is very good in helping my daughter with her Spanish and English vocabulary. This is also a good product for students.  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.

Reviews.Title: Great lil phone
Reviews.Author: Candice M. Lane "Dice Meister"
Reviews.Content: I am deployed right now. We dont have the "regular" cell phone companies, its a SIM card from an Afghan network. I love this phone though. Its small, all the applications I need are in it and the camera works great! I got it in pink, my favorite color.

Reviews.Title: nice phone, fully satisfied with my item
Reviews.Author: kuikrakui
Reviews.Content: I got the item on time, it seems new although I bought it as a refurbished one. I just needed to insert my homeland sim card and it worked. The battery is good . Congratulations and keep on going in the same path. I would recommend everybody to buy it.

Reviews.Title: My Samsung B3310
Reviews.Author: nessa2fine
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone in August 2010 from Amazon and after two days i lost the phone. I was so angry then it turned it was in my friends luggage but she was in New York so i had to wait two extra weeks before i got to use the phone. It takes great photos, its very small and easy to use. After two months of using the phone the screen got cracked and i was unable to fix it because the phone screen is very expensive in Jamaica. I still have this phone and it works even with the broken screen.

Reviews.Title: cute lil phone
Reviews.Author: bookfan09
Reviews.Content: hi..this is a pretty great phone..battery life is good so far...only goes like say three or four days and then i have to recharge it.  screen is not too small, havent had to adjust much on the phone, and it dials and receives calls very easily.  just not sure how to get a ringtone on there or keep certain numbers from calling or whatnot. one real nitpick i have is that i am not used to the whole two thumb texting thing lol.  other than that...great phone..thanks :)

Reviews.Title: Okay phone
Reviews.Author: Gina M.
Reviews.Content: This phone was a hit with my tween daughter because of the color and size. I was taken back personally about the size. A good phone for kids, I guess. I cannot get it to send or receive picture texts although it is in our plan. I read online that apparently this is an issue that cannot be resolved. I wish I knew that before buying. My daughter is disappointed that she is not able to do this.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Shishir
Reviews.Content: It's a good cell phone which has all the basic functionalities in it. It is not recommended for high end cell phone users, but for basic users this is a very good handset. Its earpiece has very low volume which may cause problems in loud places.

Reviews.Title: cute phone
Reviews.Author: Q. Zhao
Reviews.Content: This phone is small and cute. It has every function to meet your requirement if you don't want a data plan.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Cindy
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone because my was stolen and I wanted to try a different one. I read all the reviews on this phone before I ordered it, most of the reviews were positive so I took a chance and ordered it.I am very happy with it, it has good reception and clear sound. With my old phone I had a problem getting reception in some stores so I used this phone at the store I didn't get reception and it worked. The pictures I have taken so far are not bad at all,I have no problem sending pictures via email and surfing the internet is not a problem at all. As mentioned in other reviews it's small for big hands but I like the fact that I can just put it in my pocket. I believe I made a good buy, do recommend it.Samsung B3310 Unlocked Cell Phone with 2 MP Camera - International Version with No Warranty (Titan Gray)

Reviews.Title: Good Choice
Reviews.Author: Keith Shaftel
Reviews.Content: This unlocked phone worked flawlessly in Hong Kong and paid for itself several times over in saved roaming charges in 9 days of use.

Reviews.Title: Voice only user of Samsung B3310 from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: Good sound quality and battery life.  Like the slide out keyboard.  Only complaint is that it only seems to pick up one phone # per contact from my SIM.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Compact Socializer
Reviews.Author: C. Sammy "dvd trans-siberian"
Reviews.Content: This phone is small, neat and can be used for email and it has a camera perfect/

Reviews.Title: great little phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for traveling the states and work,it has been everything I needed. Battery life is excellent,notekeeping, camera all it's functions are spot on. The service from Amazon,exeptional! The phone came missing it's battery, 1 call 3 min. 4 day's brand new phone and on the plane. i will be back:)

Reviews.Title: Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Vicki Ware
Reviews.Content: I love my new phone.  It was very easy to use straight out of the box.  I love the numbers on the side and how easy it is to slide and use the keyboard.  You would love this phone.

Reviews.Title: nice easy handle cell
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: good and nice cell phone tecnology very confortable for the hand aerodinamic design to a very fast answer of messages very happy whith this product

Reviews.Title: mi opinion
Reviews.Author: Aura Oropeza "v.t"
Reviews.Content: si me gusta el telefono, pero tiene sus pro.por no ser del pais, no me lo han podido codificar para el internet, siendo desbloqueado.si se le coloca cuanquier chik pero el problema esta en el internet.para usarlo diario en llamadas y mensajes esta bien, toma bien las fotos y el teclado es lindo.pero la samsung de venezuela no quiere tocar los telefonos extrangeros

Reviews.Title: BOOK "R" US
Reviews.Author: James H. Camacho III "JHC Book's-R-Fun"
Reviews.Content: I purchase this phone for my daughter in H.S..She like the features and color.Thank you !

Reviews.Title: Two Thumbs Down
Reviews.Author: Sasha Baranco Mathieu
Reviews.Content: The internet is much too expensive. I bought this phone for it's original look and didn't realize that it was International. If I want to add anything to this, I have to go through a company in another country and most anything I ask for is either not possible to add or the person cannot understand what I am asking for.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointed 11 year old
Reviews.Author: D. Ortiz
Reviews.Content: My son loved this phone & the fact that it was an international version did not overly inconvenience us but we live in a rural are and although with other phones we are still able to get a clear signal my son was never able to achieve better than 1 bar & most of the time he had no signal at all.

Reviews.Title: Good internatonal phone
Reviews.Author: Maia "Maia"
Reviews.Content: A good choice if you want to a good basic phone that works for international travel and has a qwerty keyboard.Note:  When mine came I plugged it in to charge the battery, but it would not seem to charge.  I thought either the battery or the charger were defective.  Then I discovered that the battery was fully charged.

Reviews.Title: Question....
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Hello everyone, you see I'm interested on this phone how ever before I buy it [...] I wanted to know if it's included: the battery, charger and the head phone set. Also that when it says unlocked it means that it can be used with any chip of any phone company.Please, if you buy it in amazon please help me with these doubtsThanks and regards,

Reviews.Title: Love product unable to use with verizon wireless
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "study queen"
Reviews.Content: Verizon wireless did not want me to use an unlock phone because they said it has to be from their company. To me a phone is a phone and it should not matter from where it came from or which provider

ProductInfo.Features:
Card Slot
quad band
2mp camera
mp3
mp4 player
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung B3310 Unlocked Cell Phone with 2 MP Camera - International Version with No Warranty (Titan Gray)
